🚀 Capture ideas and organize your notes with SnapMemo!

SnapMemo is your quick and seamless note-taking tool, designed to help you capture ideas, tasks, and reminders directly from your browser. Manage your notes effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive dashboard — no account needed 👍

🆕 New in 1.4:

⏰ Reminders: Set reminders for specific notes at intervals of 15, 30, 45, or 60 minutes. Receive a notification when it’s time to review your note. The reminder is automatically cleared after the notification is sent.

⭐ Key Features:

📝 Quick Note Creation: Instantly add notes from the popup without leaving your current webpage.
📄 Context Menu: Add notes directly by selecting text on any webpage and right-clicking to choose “Save to SnapMemo” The selected text is automatically stored as the note's content, with the page's domain as the title.
📋 Centralized Dashboard: View, edit, and manage all your notes in one place.
⏰ Reminders: Set a reminder for any note to receive a one-time notification at your chosen interval (15, 30, 45, or 60 minutes).
📄 Rich Text Editing: Notes can now include bold, italic, and underlined text using a built-in editor.
🔢 Credits-Based Model (PRO): Start with 30 credits for premium features, with usage tracked directly in the dashboard.
📄 Download Notes as PDF(PRO): Save your notes as PDFs for easy sharing and offline access.
✉️ Send to Email(PRO): Send your notes to an email address directly from the dashboard.
🗑️ One-Click Clear: Easily delete all notes at once, with a confirmation prompt for security.
🔒 Local Storage: SnapMemo works entirely offline. All notes are saved on your device, ensuring your data remains private.

SnapMemo is built to make note-taking quick, easy, and accessible. Perfect for anyone looking to capture ideas, jot down tasks, or keep track of reminders right in their browser.

📩 Support & Feedback: For any questions or feedback, please contact us.
